comments:
Launched a Runtime-Workbench, everything went fine, but during shutdown I got a
general message from the workbench saying that an error happened (sorry, don't
remember the exact message, but it didn't have any details) and the exception

build: i200402101600

Note that it hasn't happened again.

This was most likely caused because your cursor position caused the stack trace 
shell to pop up.  When this shell is disposed, it tries to give the focus back 
to the log.  In your case, you may have shutdown the workbench while it was 
open; thus, the error log was shutdown, the shell had nothing to give the focus 
to, and gave you an error in the hopes that you would remedy its suddent onset 
of loneliness :)

Fixed :)
*** Bug 52572 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
